content.question: The sculptor of the work shown chose to show the figure’s arm extended to

choices.label: emphasize the importance of casting a vote
dramatize a confrontation with another ruler
highlight his speaking skills as a gifted orator
demonstrate his piety through a gesture of prayer

content.answer: highlight his speaking skills as a gifted orator
